title: How to Set up Your PlayStation 1

steps.title: Get your PlayStation out of the box.
steps.content: Get your PlayStation out of the box.

steps.title: Place it next to the TV you would like to use.
steps.content: Place it next to the TV you would like to use.

steps.title: Get hold of the three-way wire (red,white,yellow) and place the black side into the console.
steps.content: Get hold of the three-way wire (red,white,yellow) and place the black side into the console. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Colour coordinate the colours so that the red wire goes in the red slot in the back or side of the TV (do the same with the white and the yellow).
steps.content: Colour coordinate the colours so that the red wire goes in the red slot in the back or side of the TV (do the same with the white and the yellow). [2] X Research source

steps.title: Get the plug and put it into the wall.
steps.content: Get the plug and put it into the wall. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Get the controller and plug that into the player 1 slot.
steps.content: Get the controller and plug that into the player 1 slot. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Then get the Memory Card and put that into the slot atop of the player 1 slot.
steps.content: Then get the Memory Card and put that into the slot atop of the player 1 slot.

steps.title: Turn on the TV and switch it to AV.
steps.content: Turn on the TV and switch it to AV. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Place a disc onto the spindle.
steps.content: Place a disc onto the spindle.

steps.title: Shut the case and turn the game on.
steps.content: Shut the case and turn the game on.
